{"doc":{"info":{"calaisRequestID":"9481cb16-c6ae-5e7d-146f-22b22754ae6a","id":"http://id.opencalais.com/iNYBmI-Acb3XxHLv5R3cyw","docId":"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/ade42d7e-18d2-37f7-9336-f881c6f929c6","document":" ￼Words for Senilio to Work into a Patter-Song \u2018My body is a broad and blossoming meadow. \u2019 (^VIVIAN DE SOLA PINTCT> ^ g.CP'J - p -7 | C A P S My body is a relief map in eruption Wrinkles wrinkles wrinkles riddle the landscape Pimples keep on erecting and detumescing all the time My face swells and subsides and always finishes older I have one or two grey hairs among the hairs around my testicles I give my eyeballs everyday marks for yellowness and bloodshotness I blow my nose hard each morning to find out how deaf I am My handkerchiefs are filled with snot When I make love I do it fiercely several nights in a row As if it were the last time each time Then go on the booze for a fortnight Insulting my dear wife with silences II When I wake at four in the morning There are always two landscapes inside One is the mess one has made of one\u2019s human life (I can say it only in dreams I am always trapped in the leaking submarine, the executioner taps on the door I am always back at school or in the army Having lost my rifle not read Beowulf]) Two is the gurgling and splashing and undermining in the bowels The snuffle in the bronchi and the sinuses Orchestrating with bloody birds and aeroplanes outside Cancer has captured this town and that town one says III 7 j- I One get up makes tea Discusses the possible public image with the shaving-mirror Trims the beard sharp One walks into the sunlight rehearsing wisecracks One\u2019s wife will, mercifully, give one breakfast Consents to gossip. Ill \n￼Senilio\u2019s W eather Saw If Church spire be clear Twill be daamp round here If it be not Twill be bloody hot When thee caant see spire Church be on fire And we\u2019ll hang the parson, squire And the whole bleeding choir. 112 I ","docTitle":"","docDate":"2014-07-01 08:44:12.152"},"meta":{"contentType":"text/raw","emVer":"7.1.1103.5","langIdVer":"DefaultLangId","processingVer":"CalaisJob01","submissionDate":"2014-07-01 08:44:11.637","submitterCode":"57b17a53-6e34-87b0-20ff-a419896f49c9","signature":"digestalg-1|8gX6DIUsduIABp7Z0wdH+LMORec=|gWd7wAfLBGJHFVIjrAw7aAtNekiVtsgtNVnA6kd4qg4iZQkHSum6GQ==","language":"English"}},"http://d.opencalais.com/dochash-1/ade42d7e-18d2-37f7-9336-f881c6f929c6/lid/DefaultLangId":{"_typeGroup":"language","language":"http://d.opencalais.com/lid/DefaultLangId/English"},"http://d.opencalais.com/genericHasher-1/23f2c87b-0123-3c13-827c-f24e2ccf31a6":{"_typeGroup":"entities","_type":"Facility","name":"Saw If Church spire","_typeReference":"http://s.opencalais.com/1/type/em/e/Facility","instances":[{"detection":"[Consents to gossip.
